alert.note: Alert for Allendale; Charleston; Dorchester; Hampton; Inland Colleton; Tidal Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 6:17PM EST until January 22 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM FRIDAY TO 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze to up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Dorchester, Hampton, Inland Colleton, Allendale, Tidal Berkeley and Charleston Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM Friday to 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Ice accumulation on elevated surfaces, including bridges and overpasses, trace to one-tenth of an inch expected. Difficult travel conditions are possible. Hazardous wind chills as low as 15 degrees Saturday morning could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Allendale; Charleston; Dorchester; Hampton; Inland Colleton; Tidal Berkeley
